entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please add codefix for constructor exits with "null" non-nullable members #66523
  • Better error fix suggestions on For loops when use commas rather than semicolons #66522

PullRequests

Created

  • Add assert failure to fatal error helper #66524
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update Collection Literal Team #66521
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix handling of Regex classification when splitting to multiple lines #66508
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Option helpers for VS Mac #66479
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline diagnostics - fix multiple blank lines bug #66468
    Area-IDE
  • Implemented `Make field/property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net6.0 MS.CA and MS.CA.C# build and annotate for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
